reviewText:
This is an excellent instructional on the Slot machine. Jeff Compton explains in detail how the slot machine works. I watch the video over and over as to view  the slot machines at the IGT showroom and the dialog between our host,Jim Anderson and the  slot expert,Jeff Compton. The GameWatch section is interesting...very interesting.

Since there are new slot machines being introduced. I hope Jeff Compton and GameWatch will keep us informed. I will certainly buy more of his instructionals on VHS/DVD.
